author: Justin Hawkins Rides Again
description:
It's the Brit Awards on Saturday and among the nominees for Best New Artist are English Teacher. I've been meaning to talk about them for a while - so I am late to this class, but I enjoyed the lesson. 

To watch the video for The World's Biggest Paving Slab uninterrupted:  https://youtu.be/YNkbgumvYyA?si=O9_m3ncpkUJ5S6xW

And to watch more of the tracks by the other nominees mentioned: 

Last Dinner Party: https://youtu.be/pETz4IMmeDU?si=iMl5UUmk4reeI5Mg
Ezra Collective: https://youtu.be/5JUjFN9AuFU?si=dnE_4f3_JqzM_lgv
Myles Smith: https://youtu.be/9VbDkDALT7w?si=vwN7Ha2jSePgKnxU
Rachel Chinouriri: https://youtu.be/RUdeXgc4vL0?si=8JI0fqKUYmQUuxr0


The new Darkness album comes out next month,  you can pre-order 'Dreams On Toast' on CD, vinyl or cassette here: https://thedarkness.lnk.to/dreamsontoast/

See The Darkness on tour across the UK in March, tickets are on sale here: https://www.thedarknesslive.com/tour-dates/

From mid March, watch more episodes of Justin Hawkins Rides Agai
title: English Teacher: Best In Class?
